name: Horses Match Memory Game: Pair Up Horse Photos
name_original: Horses Match Memory Game: Pair Up Horse Photos
description:
The fun memory matching game with amazing HD photos!

80+ pictures in stunning high definition on the Retina display and iPad.

Try to get the best score by finding the pairs of photos that match each other. Challenging and fun, this game really gives your mind and memory a great workout.

And every photo is numbered so you can find out what it is!

This app works on the iPod Touch, iPhone, and iPad, so you always have it with you for a quick game.
